testsuite.name: to.dev.example.RobotTest

testcase.name: Given the Robot is placed, when it Move command attempts to go beyond the board, the Robot is unable to move further()
Given the Robot is placed, when the Right command is called, a valid location is returned showing the Robot is now facing one position right of NORTH()
Given the Robot is placed, when the Move command is called, a valid location is returned showing the Robot has moved forward one space from it's previous position()
Given the Robot is placed, when the Left command is called, a valid location is returned showing the Robot is now facing one position left of NORTH()

testsuite.system-err: Oct. 07, 2021 7:58:29 PM to.dev.example.Robot move INFO: The Robot has reached the edge of the board ..stopping
